From: Ahmad Alhamawi <Ahmad.Alhamawi@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Farah Awad <Farah.Awad@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-25 17:53
Subject: LC Renewal 
--------------------------------------------------
Hello Hagop,

Hope you are doing well,

Kindly find the attached to sign this contract created from Jafza portal.

The articles mentioned in the contract are only linked to your visa as per labour law and as per JAFZA.

However, for your job, you will follow what was agreed on in your offer letter including the notice period.

Also, the total in Jafza we can’t calculate with your benefits, you will get what you get it in the offer from the company.

Kindly note this contract Jafza created will not affect your salary.

Hope the above is clear,

Thank you to share it soonest and sign on the second party.

Regards,

AHMAD ALHAMAWI​​​​	
ASSOCIATE ‑ PEOPLE RELATIONS	
REAL FZE JORDAN	
AMMAN	
‑	
JORDAN
